meta.job_title: Maintenance Supervisor (Elevators and Escalators) II - Instructor

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deliver training programs for Elevator and Escalator maintenance, including safety, skill refreshers, and induction of new hires.
Supervise and instruct students, develop and write lesson plans, and maintain training aids and associated equipment.
Attend vendor training and perform administrative tasks and duties to meet the unit's business needs.
Interact with hourly, supervisory, and management employees.

education_certification.credential: Five years of full-time satisfactory experience in the installation, maintenance, and repair of elevators or escalators, with at least one year in a supervisory capacity.
Completion of annual financial disclosure statement if the position earns more than $105,472 per year.
